Parameters:

  • ref_picks (dict) ‚Äì Dictionary of reference picks with station_phase_time keys

obspy.core.event.Event

SeisMonitor.monitor.locator.utils.filter_arrivals_by_distance(events, distance, min_P_phases=3, min_S_phases=2)[source]ÔÉÅ

Filter events based on arrival distance and minimum phase counts.

Parameters:

  • events (list) ‚Äì List of event objects

  • distance (float) ‚Äì Maximum distance for arrivals in degrees

  • min_P_phases (int) ‚Äì Minimum number of P phases required

  • min_S_phases (int) ‚Äì Minimum number of S phases required

Returns:

Filtered list of events meeting criteria

Return type:

list

SeisMonitor.monitor.locator.utils.get_bad_and_good_events(reloc_catalog)[source]ÔÉÅ

Separate events based on arrival azimuth uniformity.

Parameters:

reloc_catalog (obspy.core.event.Catalog) ‚Äì Relocated event catalog

Returns:

(good_events, bad_events) where good_events have varying azimuths

and bad_events have uniform azimuths

Return type:

tuple
